channel.title: 718 Spawning with coins
channel.description:
[Update] I have just found a thing called 'prices.java' but that only shows up price when someone is trading.
I need help urgently with... On my 718 Spawn server you can spawn almost anything except rares, donator items ect. Someone please tell me how to make it so you spawn items with Coins? Like where to insert database and what would in need to change in 'Commands.java' Willing to give moderator on a server with alot of players! Hints, anything that could make me progress in coding would help so much. Thank you
Skype: RspsSupport

item.title: 718 Spawning with coins

item.title: 718 Spawning with coins
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

well i know uptill 614s but im guessing that you would have to make a shophandler and if it already has it then look for a pricelist.cfg or something like that and if not those two im guessing its in buttonhandler

Read full topic

item.title: 718 Spawning with coins

That makes scene and never though of it so thank you so much. But where would all the item price ect come from?? Thanks alot.

item.title: 718 Spawning with coins
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

i think you add a statement where after you spawn the item you remove the coins and if theres not enough coins player get message (" you dont have enough coins") im not sure about 718s XD or remove item command and add shops ^^
